ee nisama, wisheshayen shri lankawe deshapalana gamanmage dishanathiya wenas kala, ee wagema lankaw prathama samaja pipirima wana 71 karalla aashritha kruthi kipayak osse ehi deshapalanika ha samajiya wigrahayan sidukara thibuna da ee atharin patakaya wenath manayakata nathinam 71 karalla desa wenasma wigrahayak yedena kruthiyaka thewana mudranaya 71 karallata wasara 40k pirimata samagamiwa patakayan athata pathwiya. 71 aprel 05 wana dina athadanguwe siti rohana wichewira yapanaya bandhanagarayen mudaganime meheyuma sakriyawa meheya wu pudgalaya (bart mahaththaya) wanne mema kruthiye kathuwaraya ya.

kotinma amarika eksath janapada rajyaye 1947 hi jiwath wu nithi sampadakayin wisin eratehi janathawa balaganwima sandaha saha pa්rajathantha්rawadaya surakshitha kirima sandaha gena aa 22 wana wyawastha sanshodhanaye paramarthayan udu yatikuru karamin lankawe ek pudgalayekuge saha kandayamakage awashyatha sapuraganimata pa්rajathantha්rawadi wyuhayange pawathma nishka්riya kota hudu paudgalika abhilashayakata ratehi deshapalana ka්riyakarithwaya ek pudgalayeku wata ho kandayamak wata gonu karawimata ape nithi sampadakayan ada wana wita samath wa atha.

shi්ra lanka sama lekam karyalaye pa්radhani -mahacharya rajiwa wijesinha”norwe rajaya saha el.ti.ti.ee. ya athara thibunu hitha – mithurukam ada binda wati athi bawath jon westborg, erik solhayim wannawun lankawa gana mawala thibunu chitha්rayath ada wenas wi thibena bawath shi්ra lanka sama mahalekam karyalaye pa්radhani mahacharya rajiwa wijesinha mahatha pawasayi.ohu me adahas pala kele norwe hi shi්ra lanka thanapathi karyalayata pahara dime siddhiya pilibandawa adahas dakwamini.shi්ra lankawe pawathi abhyanthara gataluwak 1983 di athi kala kalu juliya nisa antharjathika pa්rashnayak bawata path wu baw penwa dena hethema; ee gataluwa kemen odu duwamin thibiyadi 2001 di assan kerunu satan wirama giwisumen el.ti.ti.ee. yata shi්ra lanka rajaya ha samana thaththwayak laba dima hethuwen ada koti sanwidhanaya demala janathawage ekama niyojithaya lesa peni sitimin widesha gatha shi්ra lankika demala janaya shi්ra lanka rajayata erehiwa usi ganwime awasana thurumpuwada hasthayata gena athi bawath hethema kiyayi.

“mama sabaragamu palathe.
apa asitha perera mahathata da yukthiya ishta kala yuthu ya.
budurajanan wahanse rahasin wath paw nokala seka.
loka kusalana pithikaruwan handunagena thibena sangakkara thun iriyaw kridakayan lesa anjalo mathiws, thisara perera, surach randiw kerehi balaporoththu thaba thibe.
sinamawa wyaparayak lesa gaththama shonarawalin thorawa hithanna amaruyi.
upasaka thana desa balu hamuduruwanta sina pahala wiya..”

ee nisa mama meka digata liyanna hithuwa.
mama ee kathawen aththatama apahasuthawayakata path una eda obata nopennuwata ...."
